text:
pra jA#yAmahAq itiq tamA#diqtyEByaqH prAya#cCaqn taM dvAdaqSAhA$nyabiBaruqstEnaq trINi# ca SaqtAnyasRu#jantaq traya#stri(gm)SataM caq tasmA$d dvAdaSAqhaM BAqrya#H praiva jA#yatEq tEnaq vai tE saqhasra#masRujantOqKA(gm) sa#hasrataqmIM ~Mya EqvamuKya(gm)# sAhaqsraM ~MvEdaq pra saqhasra#M paqSUnA$pnOti || 14
(aqgniqvAn - pa#SuqmAna#sAqnItiq vA aqgni - rddha#viShyE - mRuSEt praqjApa#tistvA sAdayatuq tayA# dEqvata#yA&~ggiraqsva dhruqvA sI#daq - tEnaq - tAnA#diqtyA a#bruvaqn pra yUqyama#janiDhvaM ~MvaqyaM - ca#tvAriq(gm)qSacca#) (A2)
